name: Apez
description: This is an exploration into what is a fps.It is a game with an expensive campaign with hundreds of hours of single player gameplay and an expansive multiplayer gameplay with up to twenty people at the same time there are lots of fully fledged multiplayer maps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: Intel Pentium or newer Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce G210 or greater Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: SB AWE 32 or greater
